title: 6.1 Master Challenge 2
question:
Refer to the graph below and solve the following questions:
Q1. Prepare a table in Excel with the data displayed in the bar graph.
Q2. Find the total screen time of the week. (Hint: Use the + operator / Sum function / Autosum).
Q3. Plot the data on a pie chart.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

input = 1
